params.key: The text data key to query.
The text data key to query.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.value: The text data value to set.

params.pluginAddress: The new address where remains the plugin.

params.value: The text data value to set.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getContent(address,uint16).notice: Returns the content associated with an content Series and Key.

getRecord(address,uint16).notice: Returns the data associated with an record Series and Key.

setContent(address,uint16,string).notice: Sets the content data associated with an Series and key. May only be called by the owner of that series.

setPluginController(uint16,address).notice: Sets the plugin that controls specific entry on records. Only owner of this contract has permission.

setRecord(address,uint16,address).notice: Sets the module contract associated with an Series and record. May only be called by the owner of that series, module itself or record plugin itself.
